column3:
前世も来世もウワサ好き ミツバやで！
みんな現世でもウワサしてる？
今一番気になるウワサはコレ！

『流れ星のお宝！』

空一面に広がる星の絨毯…
その中に一筋の光…
そうみんな大好き流れ星！

なんでも流れ星の落ちた場所には
お宝があるってウワサやで～
今度見つけたら追いかけてみよ！

ミツバおススメ度 ★★★★☆
column4:
This is Traysi! I have a taste for
the rumors of worlds long gone and
worlds yet to come!
Everyone gossiping in the present
world? Here's my favorite bit of the
latest news...
Treasures of the Falling Star!


The stars spread out in the sky like a
tapestry, and across that expanse, you
see one streak of light—a shooting star!
And I've heard that there is treasure
waiting where these stars have landed.

The next time you see one, why not track
it down to see where it lands?

Traysi's Recommendation: ★★★★☆

column3: 『ウワサのミツバちゃん Vol.4』
